entry: i have been reading some poetry by araceli romero from the 80's, it is fantastic!.
came accross a lovely resource to help inspire and get writing here called [The Poetry Lab](https://www.thepoetrylab.com/).

i need to print more editions of my chapbooks. my current stock is running low. i always forget i have [kofi](https://ko-fi.com/kmrowe) to sell digital editions as well, i am not a good marketer or capitalist though.
started writing poems with [ovipoet](https://github.com/robotamerica/ovipoet) and i am really enjoying it!
built a poetry driven neovim writing environment piggy-backing off of [oviwrite](https://github.com/MiragianCycle/OVIWrite). will blog about it on [robotamri.ca](https://robotamri.ca) soon.
poetry is being and [everywhere being is dancing](https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/2253688.Everywhere_Being_is_Dancing)
